channel.title: elroyjetson tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from elroyjetson.

item.description: @GoogleWorkspace In a blog post about Smart Canvas was the mention of Topic-Voting Table Templates. Was this ever rolled out and if so how do you create them? https://t.co/YiAiHzozOU
item.source:markdown: @GoogleWorkspace In a blog post about Smart Canvas was the mention of Topic-Voting Table Templates. Was this ever rolled out and if so how do you create them? https://t.co/YiAiHzozOU

item.description: @davewiner That has always been the best feature really, but this is the problem of focus on growth versus focus on making a really good product. Turns out it is very hard to do both simultaneously.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner That has always been the best feature really, but this is the problem of focus on growth versus focus on making a really good product. Turns out it is very hard to do both simultaneously.

item.description: @davewiner I use a Chromebook quite often and, to be honest, could will probably use it as my full time coding laptop once my current Mac dies. The big thing I have noticed is that you have to update ChromeOS when available or it gets unpredictable.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner I use a Chromebook quite often and, to be honest, could will probably use it as my full time coding laptop once my current Mac dies. The big thing I have noticed is that you have to update ChromeOS when available or it gets unpredictable.

item.description: @mahemoff I am trying to figure out how to add this to my growing collection of future visions tech videos that I have on Plex. I am a sucker for future visions videos.
item.source:markdown: @mahemoff I am trying to figure out how to add this to my growing collection of future visions tech videos that I have on Plex. I am a sucker for future visions videos.
